### Comment > User rules/allow list doesn’t seem to work > Steps to replicate: > 1: enter any website > 2: disable AdGuard and reload the page if it doesn’t do so automatically > 3: observe how the website looks no different > > The only way to actually disable AdGuard, whether it’s supposed to be disabled on that website or not, is to select “Turn Off Content Blockers” in the other menu. > The same issue is present on an iPhone running iOS of the same version. ``` Username: @Luigi2262 ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body: The three disabled screenshots show that it was already disabled, and where to find the other menu I mentioned. The linked website is something Outlook filters all links through to check for malware, and it redirects you to some irrelevant Reddit post I made, which the third screenshot shows trying to load.
